summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5484 for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue, from West Green Lake Way to North 85th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 69951, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
